title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.06 - City of Yonkers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.06 - City of Yonkers

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

April 21, 1993, see also subd. (a) below.] The southbound roadway of Central Park Avenue. The southbound roadway
of Central Park Avenue from the southbound Thruway (I-87) off-ramp at exit 5 to

Yonkers Avenue, a distance of 1.5+- miles; and from Yonkers Avenue to the
southbound Thruway (I-87) on-ramp at Crotty Avenue, a distance of 0.2+- mile. (a) [Eff. April 21, 1993, see also
subd. (a) above.] The southbound
roadway at Central Park Avenue. The southbound roadway of Central Park Avenue
from Caldors in the City of Yonkers to the southbound Thruway (I-87) on-ramp at

Crotty Avenue, a distance of 5.4+- miles. (b) [Eff. until April 21, 1993, see also
subd. (b) below.] The northbound roadway of Central Park Avenue. The northbound
roadway of Central Park Avenue from the northbound Thruway (I-87) off-ramp at

Midland Terrace to Yonkers Avenue, a distance of 0.5+- mile; and from Yonkers

Avenue to the Thruway (I-87) on-ramp at exit 5, a distance of 1.2+-
miles. (b) [Eff. April 21, 1993, see also subd. (b) above.] The northbound roadway of Central Park Avenue. The
northbound roadway of Central Park Avenue from the northbound Thruway (I-87)
off-ramp at Midland Terrace at Caldors in the City of Yonkers, a distance of
5.1+- miles. (c) Yonkers Avenue. Yonkers Avenue from Central Park Avenue to Ashburton Avenue, a distance of
1.5+- miles. (d) Ashburton Avenue. Ashburton Avenue from Yonkers Avenue to Saw Mill River Road (Route 9A), a
distance of 0.4+- mile. (e) Saw

Mill River Road (Route 9A). Saw Mill River Road from Ashburton Avenue to the

Dellwood Plant at 170 Saw Mill River Road, a distance of 0.6+-
mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8155.06

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
